name: KOMPAN. FOUR TOWERS WITH NETWORK AND BRIDGES
description: Equipment for playgrounds KPL4006 "FOUR TOWER WITH NETWORK AND BRIDGES" (FOUR TOWER W / NET & BRIDGES) from the series Game systems from the famous Danish manufacturer Kompan. Link to the manufacturerâ€™s website: https://www.kompan.ru/igra/igrovye-sistemy/igrovye-kompleksy-prosto-igraj/chetyre-bashni-s-setkoj-i-mostikami Faces: 128916 Verts: 153458 Vray: 4.20.00. Who works in the V-Ray version lower than 3.1, be careful, in the materials in the BRDF section there is Microfaset GTR (GGX), if your version is older than 3.1, then the BRDF field will be empty. Choose Blinn, Phong or Ward - which is preferable for you. Corona 5.0. For Corona render, it is recommended to install a version of at least 1.5, since the glossiness of materials is configured with PBR in mind. 3dsMax2016 + fbx, mat files and textures files included.
